description: A masochistic middle-aged man hired to perform during DMC`s concerts as the "Capitalist Pig" (資本主義の豚, Shihonshugi no Buta), whose role is to let himself being beaten and abused by http://anidb.net/ch1717 [Krauser] during the shows. He works part-time at a convenience store to make ends meet.
name: Shihonshugi no Buta
